resources.string:
I'm a mobile application developer living in New Delhi,India. Iâ€™m extremely passionate about mobile application development. I have over 6 years of Industry experience. I love to transform ideas into mobile apps. 
 
 This app is a small initiative to provide best in class interview questions and link all the Android developers through a common information sharing bridge. 
 App features to boost your knowledge - 
 # Best in class interview questions 
 #Sync questions to read offline. 
 # Android updates for developer as well as users 
 # Join developer community to stay connected with developer world. 
 # Make a note for your favourite questions. 
 # Sync questions to read offline. 
 # Get new questions and updates biweekly 
 # Soon we are going to add JAVA and Data Structure section. 
 # Use Developer community to post your problem, freelance your work and for job referrals. 
 
 Share your valuable feedback to bring the Android developer world closer and simple on droidqadiary@gmail.com Welcome to the community.
Contribute to share your expertise and knowledge. We value your content and add your questions by your name.
Do you like to answer it also ?

string.name: jointitle
string.b: Be a part of Android developer community to get latest updates, job notifications and learning resources.

string.name: addhike
string.b: Agree to be a group member on WhatsApp(Selected Users only)?

 Terms of Use 
 We are pleased to license the Android questions and answers under terms that encourage you to take, modify, reuse, re-purpose, and remix the content as you see fit. Except as noted in the Restrictions section below, you are free to use the documentation content in your own creations that will not be for commercial purpose. App reference should be given clearly where used.
